p.n: Mario Lanza: The Best Of Everything
p.k: A biographical portrait of Mario Lanza, the tenor and movie star who rose to fame in the 50s and paved the way for the likes of José Carreras and Plácido Domingo
Violin maestro Andre Rieu hosts a very special wedding party, thrilling the crowd with a host of celebratory songs
A self-portrait by Warhol causes a stir when it goes on sale in London. Two Jeff Koons Winter Bears and a once-controversial painting by Poynter also come up for grabs
Competition in which budding artists are challenged to paint a scene in four hours
Integration Contestants explore the Roman neighbourhood of Torpignattara, as they attempt to capture its diversity and multiculturalism without falling into cliches
A Dip in the Pool An American gambler must come up with a cunning plan to slow down a ship at sea in order to win a bet
The Way Up To Heaven Mrs Foster exacts an intriguing revenge on her husband after his dawdling causes her to miss a flight
Melvyn Bragg meets award-winning writer and director Amma Asante on the set of her latest film, Where Hands Touch, to find out more about the inspirational filmmaker
An intimate look at the life and career of John Wayne. Born Marion Morrison, the former football player would become one of the most iconic actors of the 20th century
Leading film critics discuss the career of Charlton Heston. After humble beginnings on stage, he took Hollywood by storm with starring in Ben-Hur and Planet of the Apes
Depart in Peace Art dealer Lionel gets an artist to visualise his fiancee Janet nude and paint her accordingly. Janet, however, does not see the funny side
My Ladylove, My Dove When Pamela and Arthur invite a young couple over for the weekend, things take a surprising turn
A fascinating look at the music and legacy of Jefferson Airplane, the San Francisco rock band that pioneered psychedelic rock
The Band The story of rockers The Band whose earthy mix of American folklore and myth included much-covered classic The Weight

p.n: Creedence Clearwater Revival: Music Icons I (7)
p.k: The story of Creedence Clearwater Revival, the Californian rock band that, for a short while, were the biggest band in America

p.n: The Grateful Dead: Music Icons I (9)
p.k: A look at Californian rock band The Grateful Dead, who emerged from the counterculture of the 60s with a diverse, eclectic style that fused myriad musical genres
85% The War in Vietnam A look at the complexities that led to America's involvement in the Vietnam War and how it changed America in ways that reverberate even today
A look at the tumultuous life and glittering 40-year career of the actress, singer and entertainer
A portrait of Hollywood's quintessential Englishman, whose career included acclaimed roles in films Separate Tables, A Matter of Life and Death and Around
The Reagan Revolution A look at the personalities and events of Reagan's two terms in the White House - both landmark legislative achievements and political setbacks

p.n: The Phantom Of The Opera At The Royal Albert Hall
p.k: Ramin Karimloo and Sierra Boggess star in this special 25th anniversary performance of Andrew Lloyd Webber's hit musical at London's Royal Albert Hall
New. A powerful dance theatre masterpiece starring international ballet star Natalia Osipova and based on Hans Christian Andersen's dark tale, The Story of a Mother
New. Musician Carlos Santana became famous in the late 60s and early 70s with his band, Santana, which pioneered a fusion of rock and Latin American jazz
Music experts discuss the life and music of Jimi Hendrix, who wowed audiences in the 1960s with his outrageous electric guitar playing skills and his experimental sound
New. A look at how Thomas Heatherwick's unusual and stunning design of many staircases became a mind-blowing tourist attraction in Manhattan, known as the Vessel

p.n: Obey Giant: The Art and Dissent of Shepard Fairey
p.k: New. A look at street artist Shepard Fairey, known for his iconic and controversial Obama 'Hope' poster. From Academy Award-winning director James Moll
